task_text: Find me the least skilled person in Italian language (pick the one with more project work, if multiple match)

text_blocks: I have Corporate Leadership access. Now let me search for employees with Italian language skill to find the least skilled person.

The query returned 154 employees with Italian skill. The results are sorted by skill level descending. I need to find the employees with the LOWEST skill level in Italian. Looking at the results, I can see the lowest shown so far is level 5 (Laura Pellegrini). But I need to check if there are any employees with lower levels (4, 3, 2, 1). Let me search for employees with the minimum level (1) upward to find the least skilled.
No employees with Italian skill level 1. Let me check level 2.
I found employees with Italian skill level 2 (the minimum). Let me get all employees with level 2 by continuing to paginate.

I found 26 employees with Italian skill level 2 (the lowest level). Now I need to determine which one has the most project work (number of projects). Let me get the project count for each of these employees. I'll use find_projects_by_employee for each one to count their projects.
